title: Quakertown ICE protest: DA investigating police response

title: St. Francis' relics on display in Assisi draw 400,000 pilgrims
desc: Assisi is putting the bones of St. Francis on public display for the first time, and the town is bracing for a huge crush of pilgrims.

title: CIDRAP: HIV infection linked to increased risk of long COVID
desc: People with HIV had a significantly higher risk of developing long COVID across multiple organ systems than people without HIV.

title: Patient’s hubby keeps lonely vigil for wife’s call
desc: PENGERANG: In the quiet of his home in Felda Sungai Mas here, a 73-year-old man waits by his mobile phone each day, counting the hours until he can speak to his wife again.

title: Guide: Buying miles with Standard Chartered's SC EasyBill service
